name: CrystalNET
description:
CrystalNET is a fun, fast paced local coop survial shooter. Play solo or with your friend.

This is a 2 levels demo. Game is still in development.

Take control of your robot and fight against hordes of infected machines. Survive all waves and unlock new missions.

History:

( - 0 - )
Artiffical intelligence is more dangerous than we thought.  Central unit called MAC1 recognize human race as enemy. 

Only the part of machines are non infected.
Only the part of machines can stop them.

Player One Controls : 
W,S,A,D - Movement
Mouse - Look around, Shoot

Player Two Controls:
Left Analog - Movement
Right Analog - Look around
L1 - Shoot

Game Features (in future):

  • Character progress system ( weapons, skills )
  • Procedural map generation,
  • New Game modes ( Defense, Assault, Endless maze ),
  • Local coop up to 4 players,
  • Funny bugs.

   Download !
   Unzip !
   Play !
   Enjoy !
